name: Tales of Malus
description:
This game was made for this jam https://itch.io/jam/bscotch100 ;

My theme was Idiopathic Origin Story so i decided to go with a old school dice rpg, unfortunately due to time constraint i had to limit my vision lol. 

Anyways The game Is about Malus. A Simple Adventurer who has been made a hero due to his inability to remember who he really is. All he remembers is his name... If Malus is even his real name that is.
